mapper.sql: SELECT t.*, m.id as member_id, m.name as member_name, m.role_id AS member_role_id, m.company_id AS member_company_id, m.email AS member_email, m.department_id AS member_department_id, m.position_id AS member_position_id, m.phone AS member_phone, m2.name as writer_name, m2.role_id AS writer_role_id, m2.company_id AS writer_company_id, m2.email AS writer_email, m2.department_id AS writer_department_id, m2.position_id AS writer_position_id, m2.phone AS writer_phone, a.NAME AS writer_avatar_name FROM TASK t LEFT JOIN TASK_MEMBER tm ON t.ID = tm.TASK_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON tm.MEMBER_ID = m.ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER m2 ON t.WRITER_ID = m2.ID LEFT JOIN AVATAR a ON a.MEMBER_ID = m2.ID
